content.rendered:
Byron Store Makeover

On Tuesday, March 31st, the Byron location will be closed so it can undergo a makeover. We’ll be installing new shelves in multiple sections, updating the floor plan, and revising the overall traffic pattern to ensure an easy shopping experience!

 

Featured Book

Read the basis for the movie! Copies of Insurgent are available at all Gottwals Books locations. $8.97 each…cheaper than Amazon, Target, and Wal-Mart! Plus, you can return OUR books for 50% in store credit.

Our locations: http://bit.ly/1ITuwSG

Books Your Kids Will Love

Have some fun with your kids with these two popular board book titles. We have recently acquired multiple, brand new copies of each book.

MSRP: $12.99 GB Price: $7.97

excerpt.rendered: On Tuesday, March 31st, the Byron location will be closed so it can undergo a makeover.
